database.name: VIEW AD_AUDIT_TRAIL_V
database.view: SELECT ad_audit_trail_id, ad_client_id, ad_org_id, isactive, created, createdby, updated, updatedby, ad_table_id, record_id, record_revision, ad_user_id, event_time, processtype, process_id, action, ad_column_id, old_char, new_char, old_nchar, new_nchar, old_number, new_number, old_date, new_date, old_text, new_text, CASE WHEN processtype = 'P' THEN (SELECT to_char(p.name) AS to_char FROM ad_process p WHERE p.ad_process_id = at.process_id) WHEN processtype = 'W' THEN (SELECT to_char(w.name) AS to_char FROM ad_tab t, ad_window w WHERE t.ad_tab_id = at.process_id AND t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id) WHEN processtype = 'X' THEN (SELECT to_char(f.name) AS to_char FROM ad_form f WHERE f.ad_form_id = at.process_id) ELSE COALESCE((SELECT to_char(ad_message.msgtext) AS to_char FROM ad_message WHERE ad_message.value = at.process_id), process_id) END AS process_desc, COALESCE(old_char, to_char(old_nchar), to_char(old_date), to_char(old_number), CASE WHEN ad_get_rdbms() = 'ORACLE' THEN CASE WHEN length(old_text) > 3996 THEN (to_char(substr(old_text, 1, 3996)) || '...') ELSE to_char(old_text) END ELSE to_char(old_text) END) AS old_value, COALESCE(new_char, to_char(new_nchar), to_char(new_date), to_char(new_number), CASE WHEN ad_get_rdbms() = 'ORACLE' THEN CASE WHEN length(new_text) > 3996 THEN (to_char(substr(new_text, 1, 3996)) || '...') ELSE to_char(new_text) END ELSE to_char(new_text) END) AS new_value FROM ad_audit_trail at
